description:
When Ataru eats one of Lum`s candies along with a manju from Cherry, he splits in two! After a late night of playing hanafuda, Ataru finds himself trapped in less than beautiful dreams by the dream weaver Mujaki and his partner Baku.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel! Ataru vs. Ataru / Waking to a Nightmare
I due Ataru - L`incubo di Ataru
Kettou! Ataru vs Ataru / Mezamereba Akumu
決斗! あたるVSあたる - 目ざめれば悪夢
